scenario_text.value: Did we do it? Did we beat Piedmon?
We did it, Miu! We won! We won!
That’s amazing! You’re incredible, Syakomon!
You would have me kneel before you...

Garurumon! Traitor! You want this world to
end in darkness, too?!

Heh. To think that a day has come when
I’m the one being called a traitor...

I just never really believed in the Master
the way you did.

I’ve been wondering...
What exactly is this “Master”?

Right? And why would he need a sacrifice?
And why do they call Miyuki a “maiden”?

Hehe...
You expect me to just answer your questions?
Rotten loser...

You lost!
We could still beat the crap out of you...
I lost?
Hehehe... Ahahaha! Me? I lost?
You still understand nothing! Ignorant fools!
What does he mean by that...?
Yow! Miu, get behind me!
What is it? The world suddenly shook...

What is this? The air has changed!
I don’t like this...
No! Miyuki!

(The fog is suddenly everywhere!
It’s much faster than before!)
Everybody, run!
Hang on, Minoru! Miyuki’s still on the altar!

Now to begin the ritual! Oh, great and mighty
Master, accept that which we offer thee...
...the sacrifice upon this altar, this child!
No!
Takuma?!
Hang on! What are you doing?
Diving into the fog? Are you crazy?

(Ryo and Shuuji were enveloped by the fog
and disappeared.)

(If I just stand here gaping, we might lose
Miyuki too.)

(I don’t want to lose anyone else!
No one!)

Let’s go, Takuma!
We need to rescue Miyuki!
...Yeah!

Hang on, Takuma!
Are you going to dive into that fog?
Forget Miyuki! You’ll die, too!
But I can’t just let her die!
So you’ll sacrifice yourself? No way!

Right! Miyuki is my problem...
We can’t lose Takuma, too!
I know I might not make it back.

But it’s better than letting the fog take
Miyuki! She can’t even move!
It’s fine. I’ll bring Miyuki back with me!

Idiot! You’re going to your death!
Stop!
Takuma, no!

I’m sorry, everyone.
But I’ll be right back!
Hahaha! Ahahahahahahahahaha!!!
Takuma!
